job.title: Senior TS React Developer
job.description:
Prezly													







															prezly.com														





														Apply now
													



													👀 1,163 views
												



																											✅ 255 applied
																																								(22%)
																									





														Share this job:
													













															Also hiring:
														





																	Typescript React Expert																
 






Prezly is hiring a 


Remote Senior TS React Developer




⚠️ Important: While this is a fully remote role, we only accept candidates within a 3-hour time difference from CET (Central European Timezone).
Prezly is looking for a typescript/react developer to expand the team. This jobs entails working closely with a product designer, the founders and builders to craft high-quality, impactful, and inclusive user experiences for communication experts all around the world.
Job requirements
Language
: Near-native English is required.
Experience
: 3+ years in a frontend (TS/React) Developer role
Communication
: Strong verbal and written communication skills. You’ll regularly engage with the rest of the Prezly team via web conferences, and email.
Remote Setup
: A good, reliable internet connection is a must, as this role is fully remote.
About the technology
Prezly is built using React/Typescript and everything in the app talks to API's that are managed by the backend/PHP team.
We're a technology company first: This means that in addition to product and business development plans, we put emphasis on continual improvement of our stack and infrastructure.
The role
We are looking for a frontend engineer with deep understanding of React and Typescriptand best practices when it comes to application development.
You will work on a variety of projects, mostly around the core Prezly product. Your work will ship continuously (when it’s done). You will have a direct impact in our customers’ experience and the overall trajectory of the business.
What we offer
Competitive Salary:
 Because great work deserves great pay.
Office Budget: 
As this is a fully remote position, we provide you with a starting budget to get your home office kitted out with the right equipment.
Amazing Tools: 
You’ll get to choose your own equipment – think of it as your utility belt for success.
Flexible Hours:
 Work when and where you’re most productive – there’s a life outside of work, and we get that.
35 Paid Days Off: 
We focus on the value you bring, not how many days you spend behind a desk. We offer a generous amount of holidays so you can bring your A-game.
Team Gatherings:
 A few times a year, we fly the team to Leuven, Belgium, to connect, collaborate, and have fun together.
Support for Your Needs:
 If there’s something important to you that’s not on this list, let us know – we’re open to finding solutions.
If this sounds like the role for you, we’d love to hear from you!
																																				Please mention the word 
CLASSY
 when applying to show you read the job post completely (#RNDAuODMuMTkyLjcz). This is a feature to avoid fake spam applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this and instantly see they're human.


 
Salary and compensation



																																								 $50,000 — $80,000/year
																									




Benefits



															🌎 Distributed team														



															🏖 Paid time off														



															🏔 Company retreats														



															🖥 Home office budget														



															👀 No monitoring system														



															🚫 No politics at work
